section.heading: Correction by arbitrator of unconfirmed award.

para.text: On motion of a party made not later than 30 days after an arbitrator gives notice under § 16-5615(a) of an award, the arbitrator may correct the award:
If the award has an evident mathematical miscalculation or an evident mistake in the description of a person, thing, or property;
If the award is imperfect in a matter of form not affecting the merits on the issues submitted; or
